summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 17th Avenue SOuthwest, from West Marginal Way to the north line of Sanders 2nd Addition to West Seattle; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9010 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
